titlestmt.titleproper: Xavier University Associate Provost for Academic Affairs office records
titlestmt.author: Tim McCabe

publicationstmt.publisher: Xavier University Archives and Special Collections

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid encoded by Tim McCabe using the OhioLINK EAD Application in 2014

did.head: Overview of the Collection

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: Xavier University Archives and Special Collections

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: Xavier University (Cincinnati, Ohio). Office of the Associate Provost for Academic Affairs

did.unittitle: Xavier University Associate Provost for Academic Affairs office records
did.abstract: Office records from the Xavier University Office of the Associate Provost for Academic Affairs. These records include correspondence, surveys, topical folders and other materials which reflect the activity of the office.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This is a collection of office records of the Associate Provost for Academic Affairs. The collection includes surveys, meeting minutes and related materials of the Academic Affairs Committee, enrollment statistics, new faculty orientation programs, and other topics.

arrangement.head: Statement of Arrangement
arrangement.p: Materials are arranged into series by transfer dates. Within each series folders are arranged generally by original order.

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions on Access
accessrestrict.p: Restricted access. Please contact the Xavier University archives staff.

otherfindaid.head: Other Finding Aid
otherfindaid.p: A detailed listing of the contents of this collection is held on a spreadsheet in the Xavier University Archives office. Please contact the archives staff.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Box Number, Folder Number, XUA-42, Associate Provost for Academic Affairs office records, Special Collections and University Archives, Xavier University Library, Cincinnati, Ohio.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: These materials were transferred from the Office of the Associate Provost for Academic Affairs to the archives on different occasions.

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: Additional materials may be transferred to the archives in the future.

controlaccess.head: Indexing Terms
controlaccess.p: The following terms have been used to index the description of this collection in the library's online public access catalog.
